text: Kenneth "Red" Norvo (31 March 1908, Beardstown, Illinois - 6 April 1999, Santa Monica, California) was an American jazz musician and dancer. He performed from the 1920s through the 1980s. During the 1920s, he was a tap dancer in Vaudeville. His main musical instrument was the vibraphone. He was also a member of The Three Ickkies. == Other websites == *Red Norvo at AllMusic Category:American jazz musicians Category:American dancers Category:Musicians from Illinois Category:1908 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Vaudeville performers
title: Red Norvo
